name: Biking and Trekking around Mai Chau
description: In the mountains of northern Vietnam not far from the Laos border you can trek and mountain bike through forested countryside inhabited by H’mong, Dao, Muong and Thai hill tribe peoples. Located just five hours from Ha Noi, this region is a convenient area to explore the sharp limestone ridges and fertile valleys of the northern interior. Staying overnight in rustic hill tribe villages you explore forest paths, mist filled valleys and old-world culture amongst stunning rice fields and mountain vistas. Diverse architecture styles, languages and textile weaving styles also add color and spice to these adventures where you can learn all about local traditions.
